videos.description: Virginia's Ty Jerome finds Isaiah Wilkins off the pick to sink the uncontested jumper.
videos.headline: Wilkins knocks down midrange jumper

videos.description: NC State's Braxton Beverly puts Virginia's Marco Anthony to the floor with the crossover, and converts the tough floater in the paint.
videos.headline: Beverly drops Johnson on crossover

videos.description: Virginia's Nigel Johnson finds Isaiah Wilkins in the corner for the 3-pointer and chance at a 4-point play.
videos.headline: Wilkins earns chance at 4-point play

videos.description: Virginia's Ty Jerome finds Kyle Guy cutting to the basket for an easy layup in the second half.
videos.headline: Jerome sets up Guy for easy lay-in

videos.description: Virginia's Ty Jerome dishes a pass out to Devon Hall behind the arc for the contested 3-pointer, making him 3-for-3 from downtown.
videos.headline: Hall knocks down 3rd consecutive 3-pointer

videos.description: Virginia's Devon Hall finds Jack Salt cutting to the basket for the two-handed dunk.
videos.headline: Hall finds Salt for the two-handed slam

videos.description: Virginia's Devon Hall takes it to the paint and finishes the crafty layup in the second half.
videos.headline: Hall converts tough layup

videos.description: Virginia's Devon Hall drives down the lane and is fouled on the layup, earning a chance at a 3-point play.
videos.headline: Hall notches career-high 22 points on lay-in

videos.description: Virginia's Nigel Johnson swings the ball over to Kyle Guy for the 3-pointer.
videos.headline: Johnson sets up Guy from downtown
